DOC.brief_title: Oral Sodium Fusidate ( CEM-102 ) Treatment Staphylococcal Bone Joint Infections Subjects Whom Chronic Antibiotic Suppressive Therapy Indicated
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , open-label , non-randomized , single-arm trial evaluate safety effectiveness CEM-102 chronic antibiotic suppressive therapy bone joint infection . Subjects enrol study must refractory staphylococcal bone joint infection require suppressive antibiotic therapy ( e.g . infection manage complete removal infect bone foreign material , refractory infection respond previous treatment , candidate long-term intravenous antibiotic therapy ) .
